ability.name: You're Driving Me Crazy
ability.description: * When Everyone Loves a Parade triggers, after Adversaries have redrawn their Intents, you may also: * Discard any of the newly drawn Intents. * An Adversary with a discarded Intent does not take an action this turn. * Take 1 Corruption Point for each discarded Intent after the first (which is a freebie).
ability.flavor: You're such a spectacle that even your foes can't help but watch.
